pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation for Rao and Yu Model // Functions to calculate EBLUPs (Empirical Best Linear Unbiased Predictor) estimators and their MSEs (Mean Squared Errors). Estimators are based on an area-level linear mixed model introduced by Rao and Yu (1994) doi:10.2307/3315407. The REML (Residual Maximum Likelihood) method is used for fitting the model.
